item.title: White House transfers background checks for top staff from FBI to Pentagon: Sources
item.description: The White House has quietly told the FBI to halt background checks on dozens of the president's top staffers and has transferred the process to the Pe...

item.title: US stocks climb amid signs government may avert shutdown
item.description: The gains erase some losses suffered during an escalating trade war.

item.title: Hamas says it will release American hostage Edan Alexander
item.description: Hamas announced it will release American hostage Edan Alexander and "the bodies of four other dual nationals."

item.title: WATCH: Millions get a glimpse at ‘blood moon’ lunar eclipse
item.description: The eclipse was visible throughout most of North and South America, as well as parts of Africa, Europe, Australia and Japan.

item.title: WATCH: American Airlines flight catches fire at Denver airport
item.description: The incident involving an American Airlines plane took place Thursday evening at Denver International Airport.
